name: Iouqah Forest
description:
You are a box looking for food in your beloved flat waste land. Levels might seem like garbage because its hard to make platforms in p5.js. The letters in the top left change colors because its sensing magic (shut up and go with it...).

This is my firstgame thats ever been posted to an online platform such as Itch.io.

lol aperantly Iouqah is a desert made with apples and suger.
